articles.title: Craig Robinson of 'The Office' evacuated from comedy show after man fires gun inside club - KABC-TV
articles.description: Actor Craig Robinson of "The Office" was set to perform a comedy show in North Carolina when a man opened fire inside the club.
articles.content: CHARLOTTE, N.C. -- Actor and comedian Craig Robinson of "The Office" was set to perform at a comedy club in North Carolina when a man waved a gun around and opened fire inside the building, police sa… [+1866 chars]

articles.title: Billy Crystal’s ‘Mr. Saturday Night’ Will End Its Broadway Run - The New York Times
articles.description: The stage musical, adapted from a 1992 film, will close Labor Day weekend after five months at the Nederlander Theater.
articles.content: Crystal is utterly in his element performing live, wrote the critic Laura Collins-Hughes in a review of Mr. Saturday Night for The New York Times. If you are a fan of his, or simply someone who has m… [+1024 chars]
